name: Rim Yoseph
text: Shannon did a phenomenal job with our wedding photos! She was receptive to our ideas, was incredibly responsive, and recommended a beautiful location by the beach where we had our ceremony. Shannon is also incredibly knowledgeable about the area and she also gave us suggestions of day trips in nearby cities that really enriched our trip. I cannot recommend Shannon enough!

name: A Marie
text: Shannon did a fantastic job at our wedding on Valentine's Day. She understood how I wanted to capture our ceremony, patiently gave me all the shots I wanted and she did a great job editing the final prints. She's worth every penny! Highly recommend !

name: Megan Simmons
text: Shannon did a wonderful job photographing our wedding. My husband explained what he was looking for and she took his ideas and made them a reality. She was patient and professional. Would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for professional pictures.

name: Maddy
text: Shannon is a great choice to photograph your special occasion.  We used her for our wedding, maternity, and newborns!  We are very happy with her work!

name: K R DePorter
text:
This was our first time ever being professionally photographed and Shannon surpassed ALL of our expectations.  She is incredibly passionate about what she does. She is extremely down to earth and makes you feel very comfortable.  She captured some really beautiful moments and we are so so pleased with the results.
Shannon is very flexible.  She was more than willing to reschedule/add more time for inclement weather, etc.
I would highly recommend Shannon for all of your photography needs and events! <3 <3

name: Valerie Monismith
text: June 2021. I hired Shannon to do family photos on the beach as well as wedding photos on the beach for my oldest son. We had a great afternoon with Shannon.  She was so easy going, and calm throughout the process.  We have a large family.  Along with our 5 children and their significant others we also had grandchildren, my mom and brother and friends as well as the brides mom and sister.  Shannon worked in separate family shots for all who were there as well as full family shots, wedding shots and it all went very smoothly and was a lot of fun.  We wanted these to be casual and for it to be a fun event and that is what it was with Shannon.  She was such a nice person and great with the kids.  We received all of  our photos within 7 weeks which is great.  With wedding photos and especially with as many shots as Shannon took this is well within the normal 2 month time frame most photographers have in their contract.  We had a great experience with Shanmon from start to finish with good communication along the way.  Highly recommend.

name: Genny Dubus
text: Very professional and very patient. We loved the photos.

name: Adrienne Gustin
text: Amazing, could not have asked for a more down to earth person to take our photos. It was quite the day but glad the weather was amazing and she captured our moment perfectly.. We even took pictures another day with her and I couldn't he happier. Thank you again!!

name: Isabela Oliveros
text: My whole family loved her pictures. Not only is the final result stunning but she made us all feel comfortable at the wedding photoshoot. Great work!!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alma Meza
text: Shannon is one talented women, the pictures she took for my God-daughters wedding in Florida were amazing, we enjoyed her company during the whole wedding. Thank you Shannon for your amazing work. I will most definitely recommend your awesome work.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: L. Wise
text: We loved our pics taken by Shannon! She was so much fun!!! We had a beach wedding ceremony in Navarre, Florida! We really appreciate the services while we were so far from home!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori.  It was my pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to hear from you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Paris Bryant
text: I was a bridesmaid in my best friend Brittney's wedding and it was a disgrace to watch the photographer not do what she was paid to do.  While getting dressed she spent more time taking pictures of the wedding rings than of the girls and the bride. After the ceremony she kept asking what kind of poses we wanted to do instead of being creative and telling us. During the reception she walked around smoking, at the bar, fixing a to go plate which were plenty of real plates because we were at a nice restaurant (she just chose to grab a to go plate because she wanted food to go, so you a lie!) and eating off the kids buffet (which was for children 12 and under only, you wrote it yourself). She didn't even get any pictures of the bride and father dance, none of the wedding favor's table, or food table.  All those pictures came from family who took their own pictures and sent it to the bride. The bride was very upset because of the money she spent to capture her one and only wedding day and to be told that most of the pictures were destroyed only after she kept hassling the photographer for months. Nothing was destroyed, she just realized that she was doing more eating, smoking and drinking and didn't have enough pictures.  Thank god family and friends were there to help capture the moments.  I would not lie about any of this...God knows everything i have written is all true! I guess she's picking how great she is with different brides because she was not great at all. If you take your business seriously, treat everyone the same because all money spends the same.

name: TC McNeil Shepherd
text: Shannon's work is unparalleled. Her passion shines through, and her attention to detail creates such a romantic feel. I highly recommend her!

text: Shannon was a true gem for our wedding pictures.  She was able to meet all of our requests - pictures on our Vespa, helped us move our arbor, and amazing sunset pictures!  I am certain we will be having anniversary pictures done by her!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Taylor.  You and Michael were so awesome to work with.  I still can't get over the photos we got.  I love them so much!

name: Brittney Alexander
text: Worst experience ever! If you want all of your wedding photos DO NOT book her! She is so unprofessional and you will not receive all of your photos! She lied several times as to when my gallery would be completed and then when she did upload it she had the nerve to send me an email telling me she lost some of my pictures due to a memory card malfunction! I have maybe 5 good wedding pictures I’m proud to show! Your wedding is one of the most important days of your life and can’t be redone! Please save yourself the heartache, pain, or lawsuit! I wish someone would of warned me! And not to mention..she ate more food then any of my guest did at my wedding instead of taking pictures like she should of! She also was at the bar and took a “to go” plate! Just so damn unprofessional! I have no first dance pics, father/daughter dance pics, no pics of my cake/decor! No good wedding party pics, first kiss pics...just NOTHING! I reached out to someone else who’s wedding she photographed and they had the exact same complaints!

name: Lexi Dettelbach
text: I was the bride and found her on google, saw pictures and thought she did a good job. She also had her daughter "work" as a photographer too but she didn't actually do anything. While we were all getting ready she spent more time taking pictures of the rings, my shoes, the dress and makeup tray than my actual wedding party and myself. Then, she decided to invite her daughter, daughter's boyfriend and granddaughter up to my reception and eat (crab, steak....). Her daughter got so drunk (she's like 26 ) and she was all over my 15 year old nephew, it was disgusting behavior. She didn't even get me walking out where they introduced us as husband and wife. I got the pictures back and I was very disappointed.  The pictures were off centered and she didn't tell me to do any poses, I had to come up with everything. All in all, not professional in my opinion.

name: Stefani Chavez
text: Shannon’s photos are absolutely stunning. She has a unique artistic perspective that makes what she captures superior to what I see from other photographers. I highly recommend her! Our family photos are always celebrity quality for a really fair price ❤️❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stefani.  It is always a pleasure to photograph your family.  I especially love getting to capture your beautiful children year after year.  They are so cuuuuute!

name: Duke Ofearl
text: Shannon photographed our Navarre Beach destination wedding in March and went above and beyond. Very professional.  We especially loved the detail and bride and groom images.  Due to weather issues, we didn't think we were going to be able to do our couple and wedding party pics on the beach like we hoped, but Shannon stayed positive and focused on getting some other pics first and then she drove back with us from the reception site to make sure we got the pics we dre!med of.  I couldn't be happier.  She also offered our family and guests a discounted rate for family pics while we we were in town.  We plan on coming back in a few months, as we just found out we are expecting and want her to capture the start of our family.  If we can, we plan on coming back every year and doing family pics.  She still offers the discount even though our wedding was in March.  I highly recommend her.  Great prices too!

resp.text:
Hi, Dan & Morgan.  Omg!  Congratulations!!  Wow.  I can't wait.  I know you both have to be so excited.  Isn't that what your Mom was teasing you about, Morgan.  haha

Your wedding was perfect.  Your families were amazing.  Thank you both so much for making me feel like part of the crew and being willing to do what it takes to get the perfect image.  My favorite has to be when you both laid in the sand for the most amazing shot EVER.  That had better be going on a canvas!  I had a blast with the wedding party images too.  Your friends were hysterical.  I told you we would have a perfect sunset.  It was definitely worth the drive back.

I am so happy for you both and can't wait to meet the little one!  <3  Woo hoo!

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

text: Shannon is an amazing photographer!!! Absolutely love her work!

resp.text: Thank you, Mel.  I had so much fun photographing your engagement photos.  You and Rob were incredible.  I love sessions at the jettys in Destin.  It definitely doesn't look like any other beach in the area.  I look forward to photographing your wedding in the Spring.  Can't wait!

name: Ana Mmba19202016
text: Greaat experience! Shannonography did our family pictures, very proffessional, right on time and she manage to do exactly what we wanted

resp.text: Hi, Ana.  It was a pleasure.  Thank you so much for allowing me to capture your family vacation.  Your kids were so cute!  The next time you come to Pensacola Beach make sure to reach out.  <3

name: brian abston
text: We hired this photographer to handle our wedding and also video.  She should never ever do another wedding again as that day is one of the most special days one can have and the pictures taken will last through generations.  All of her pics included everything except our faces.  Ring pics, holding hands pics, walking away together pics and plenty of everyone else but we didn't end up with one photograph together alone showing our faces that we can hang on the wall in our home.  She also has a terrible attitude like she didn't really want to be there.  She also missed a deadline for the video to be ready for us and when questioned by my wife she was defensive and said she would issue refund immediately and destroy the video which we assume she did and then had the nerve to threaten my wife with a lawsuit for slander if she were to leave her a negative review claiming she had a lawyer on retainer for anyone leaving a poor review.  No professional in any industry would ever say such a thing unless they knew they were wrong and felt the need to try and bully rather then use customer service to fix whatever situation had arisen!  I wouldn't let her do a weeding for someone I didn't care for let alone a loved one!  Too easy to find someone else don't put yourselves in the same position as us and unable to have just one professional wedding photo for you home!

name: Rosalinda Casarreal
text: They did my wedding on October 22, 2020 and it was absolutely beautiful. Brittany was very attentive and helpful. I remember checking the weather four days before my wedding and we had a 50% chance of rain. I immediately contacted her in a panic because of the rain and she calmed my nerves. She reassured me that everything would be okay and it was. There wasn’t a drop in sight. Chris provided us with a little extra decor which was absolutely stunning and I am forever grateful for all of the hard work they put into making it perfect. I especially love that this company only does one wedding a day because in the event of rain they would be flexible on the time frame. It’s the beach and you can’t control the weather so I’m grateful for this option. ALL of my guest enjoyed every moment of our ceremony. Many saying things along the lines of  “You see this on TV and it’s beautiful, but actually being there and experiencing it is completely a different experience” I almost wished that I was a guest at that point after all of the compliments we had gotten. We aren’t a traditional couple by any means and it wasn’t your normal traditional wedding. The ceremony was indescribable and it was nothing short of a dream. Since we have gotten married two of our friends have also decided on beach weddings, so if you’re looking for a wedding that everyone will be raving about this is the company to go with. Also, Ally did a wonderful job with our photos. My wife and I are truly blessed.

name: Wendy Brunner
text: We originally (foolishly) booked our beach wedding with a different company, and when the original company double booked our date and bumped our wedding one month before our wedding date, we scrambled to find another company. Gulf Shores Orange Beach Weddings stepped in and seamlessly took over. Brittany always answered my emails quickly and with patience. Everyone was fantastic to work with, and our day was beautiful and perfect. We couldn’t have asked for a better beach wedding experience!

name: Amy Hurley
text: Wonderful experience with our fairy tale beach wedding! Brittany and Chris are so responsive, professional and helpful! They made sure the day went smoothly and handled all the inevitable bumps with calm expedience! Would definitely recommend them to anyone planning their wedding!  It’s nothing short of a miracle to have the perfect wedding planned when you live out of state and they pulled it off!

I would 100% recommend this company to anyone looking to have a destination wedding in the Orange Beach, Gulf Shores area! Couldn’t thank everyone enough for what they did.

name: martha yarbrough
text: We were going to have a big wedding in our home town.  But it was getting to be too much. We decide to take the last of spring break to come to the beach to get married. We wanted something very simple just him and me. I email GSOB weddings and emailed with Brittany. She was very helpful and responded quickly! Met her, Chris, and Brian photographer Sunday afternoon of our wedding. Day turned out to be perfect! We just had one issue happen, we lost my mother’s vintage wedding band on the beach! Chris, Brittany, and Brian were so helpful! Chris immediately got on his phone and spoke to his competitor across the street of condo and got metal detector ASAP. After a few minutes of sweeping the area where we were standing, detector went off an my husband found it in the sand! They went above to help us find that and continue on with the wedding! We finished our vows right in the shore next to the water! Exactly how we pictured our day! Thank you, Brittney, Chris, & Brian!!!

name: Steve Duckworth
text: We had an absolutely stellar experience with Orange Beach Weddings.  We knew that Carol Morris was the right wedding planner the first time we met her.  She clearly demonstrated that she understood my daughter's vision and she was able to bring all the different vendors we selected together into a well coached team.  She worked flawlessly with the venue and created an extremely beautiful and low stress event.  When you couple her job performance with her ability to work within budget you realize that you would be hard pressed to choose a better person for the job.  I believe I would be remiss if I didn't mention that we interviewed other planners before selecting Carol.  We believed that she was clearly the best choice for our event and she proved us right.

name: K R DePorter
text:
This was our first time ever being professionally photographed and Shannon surpassed ALL of our expectations.  She is incredibly passionate about what she does. She is extremely down to earth and makes you feel very comfortable.  She captured some really beautiful moments and we are so so pleased with the results.
Shannon is very flexible.  She was more than willing to reschedule/add more time for inclement weather, etc.
I would highly recommend Shannon for all of your photography needs and events! <3 <3

name: Valerie Monismith
text: June 2021. I hired Shannon to do family photos on the beach as well as wedding photos on the beach for my oldest son. We had a great afternoon with Shannon.  She was so easy going, and calm throughout the process.  We have a large family.  Along with our 5 children and their significant others we also had grandchildren, my mom and brother and friends as well as the brides mom and sister.  Shannon worked in separate family shots for all who were there as well as full family shots, wedding shots and it all went very smoothly and was a lot of fun.  We wanted these to be casual and for it to be a fun event and that is what it was with Shannon.  She was such a nice person and great with the kids.  We received all of  our photos within 7 weeks which is great.  With wedding photos and especially with as many shots as Shannon took this is well within the normal 2 month time frame most photographers have in their contract.  We had a great experience with Shanmon from start to finish with good communication along the way.  Highly recommend.

name: Genny Dubus
text: Very professional and very patient. We loved the photos.

name: Adrienne Gustin

name: Isabela Oliveros
text: My whole family loved her pictures. Not only is the final result stunning but she made us all feel comfortable at the wedding photoshoot. Great work!!

name: Brittany Knapp
text: We were married 3 days after the start of the COVID-19 shut down. We had three days to find another venue (because ours cancelled), we ended up having our wedding 30-45mins from our original venue, and cutting our guest list in half. Which meant a longer drive for Shannonography a completely different setting, and a much different guest amount, but from the start she was down with making the longer drive, made suggestions but was not pushy if I was uncomfortable, showed up on time and I couldn't ask for better pictures from the best day of our life so far

name: Ariel morrow
text:
Planning a destination wedding without meeting any of your vendors is terrifying but Shannon completely alleviated all of my fears. I found her on Google and was immediately impressed with her work and quality of photos. She promptly responded to my message and by that afternoon I had signed a contract. We emailed back and forth and had several phone calls in the months leading up to my wedding. She listened to my vision and had many wonderful recommendations.
The day of my wedding she arrived on time and in great spirits which helped me to relax and enjoy my day! Shannon is extremely easy going and fun to work with, she even let me have an impromptu boudoir session as I was getting dressed. My ceremony was perfect and she captured every sweet moment of the day. She shot the entire reception and took some really fun photos of the after party. My family and friends loved her and she fit right in with us and felt like part of our big day! My cousin and a coworker who did not attend my wedding, both loved my portraits so much they booked sessions with her and both had great experiences and photos as well! We will definitely be doing family portraits with her on the beach next summer! Don't hesitate to book Shannon!!

name: Sandra Gonzalez
text: Shannon was wonderful to have you on that special day, great professionalism and commitment to your work.  I congratulate you.

name: Alma Meza
text: Shannon is one talented women, the pictures she took for my God-daughters wedding in Florida were amazing, we enjoyed her company during the whole wedding. Thank you Shannon for your amazing work. I will most definitely recommend your awesome work.

name: Alisha K Posada
text:
I would not recommend this vendor to anyone. We live in Ohio and were traveling to florida for our dream beach wedding. Due to the COVID-19 situation, we had to cancel our wedding as Florida law prohibited us from staying in our vacation rentals and we would be under a mandatory 2 week quarantine. I contacted Shannon to cancel and had only paid our deposit. We were hoping to get some of that money back as this was out of our control, but instead it turned into a downward spiral that was very unprofessional. We were told our money would not be returned (even though no contract was signed) and after stating we were contacting the Attorney General was met with "threaten me to try to ruin my life or livelihood, as unjust, wrong, or vile as I think that is. "

I have never been the person to leave a bad review or bad mouth someone. I won't even send back my food in restaurants if it's wrong, but this has been a terrible experience I would never wish this upon anyone. I had read other bad reviews, but I never trust just one person's experience... maybe now I will.

name: L. Wise
text: We loved our pics taken by Shannon! She was so much fun!!! We had a beach wedding ceremony in Navarre, Florida! We really appreciate the services while we were so far from home!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lori.  It was my pleasure.  If you are ever back in town, I would love to hear from you.  Merry Christmas!

name: Paris Bryant
text: I was a bridesmaid in my best friend Brittney's wedding and it was a disgrace to watch the photographer not do what she was paid to do.  While getting dressed she spent more time taking pictures of the wedding rings than of the girls and the bride. After the ceremony she kept asking what kind of poses we wanted to do instead of being creative and telling us. During the reception she walked around smoking, at the bar, fixing a to go plate which were plenty of real plates because we were at a nice restaurant (she just chose to grab a to go plate because she wanted food to go, so you a lie!) and eating off the kids buffet (which was for children 12 and under only, you wrote it yourself). She didn't even get any pictures of the bride and father dance, none of the wedding favor's table, or food table.  All those pictures came from family who took their own pictures and sent it to the bride. The bride was very upset because of the money she spent to capture her one and only wedding day and to be told that most of the pictures were destroyed only after she kept hassling the photographer for months. Nothing was destroyed, she just realized that she was doing more eating, smoking and drinking and didn't have enough pictures.  Thank god family and friends were there to help capture the moments.  I would not lie about any of this...God knows everything i have written is all true! I guess she's picking how great she is with different brides because she was not great at all. If you take your business seriously, treat everyone the same because all money spends the same.

text: I was the bride and found her on google, saw pictures and thought she did a good job. She also had her daughter "work" as a photographer too but she didn't actually do anything. Her daughter got so drunk (she's like 26 ) and she was all over my 15 year old nephew, it was disgusting behavior. She didn't even get me walking out where they introduced us as husband and wife. All in all, not professional in my opinion.

I especially love that this company only does one wedding a day because in the event of rain they would be flexible on the time frame. It’s the beach and you can’t control the weather so I’m grateful for this option. ALL of my guest enjoyed every moment of our ceremony. Many saying things along the lines of  “You see this on TV and it’s beautiful, but actually being there and experiencing it is completely a different experience” I almost wished that I was a guest at that point after all of the compliments we had gotten. We aren’t a traditional couple by any means and it wasn’t your normal traditional wedding. The ceremony was indescribable and it was nothing short of a dream. Since we have gotten married two of our friends have also decided on beach weddings, so if you’re looking for a wedding that everyone will be raving about this is the company to go with. Also, Ally did a wonderful job with our photos. My wife and I are truly blessed.

name: Steve Duckworth
text: We had an absolutely stellar experience with Orange Beach Weddings.  We knew that Carol Morris was the right wedding planner the first time we met her.  She clearly demonstrated that she understood my daughter's vision and she was able to bring all the different vendors we selected together into a well coached team.  She worked flawlessly with the venue and created an extremely beautiful and low stress event.  When you couple her job performance with her ability to work within budget you realize that you would be hard pressed to choose a better person for the job.  I believe I would be remiss if I didn't mention that we interviewed other planners before selecting Carol.  We believed that she was clearly the best choice for our event and she proved us right.

text: Ordered and arrangement for same day delivery. Never delivered. Called and was told they cancelled order. Why wouldn't you bother calling? Said they sent an email. NEVER AGAIN

name: Jason Shepard
text: Awesome staff and wonderful flower arrangements.

name: Haley Gossett
text: I used them for my wedding. I hired them 8 months before my wedding.  We had agreed on the colors of the flowers & possible substitutions the week prior to go with the theme of our wedding. When it came wedding day, our delivery was made three hours too late, the colors didn’t coordinated with what we discussed, arrangements weren’t made as discussed even with pictures that were emailed to them of what I wanted. We were missing boutonnières & my bridal arrangement ended up only being 2 flowers bigger than the bridesmaids ($120 difference ) The excuse was “it’s not our fault you got married on this weekend” word for word in a text I received from them. Very poor customer service & they will not take responsibility for their slip up.

name: Stacey Williams
text: I’m sad that I can’t post pictures of what I ordered and what I received. I was super disappointed.

name: Phillip
text: Ordered flowers to be delivered to the funeral home on a Friday. The arrangement never made it. Then I received a notification hours after the funeral on Saturday stating that the flowers had been delivered. I attempted to contact the florist by phone but could never get through.

name: Rickesha Banks
text: This company has lost all values, morals and respect for its customers. I ordered a fruit basket that looked amazing,had a variety of fruits and well priced. Upon delivery I quickly realized I had been given the incorrect fruit basket.I quickly called House of Flowers to inform them of the mishap which was quickly retired to a text message to what I assumed would be to rectify my problem .I then again explained my concerns; which then an employee of this company informed me for better lack of words the photos are misleading,and basically depends on what's in stock when orders are being crafted .You will get what's given.I am very sorry I had to experience this type of customer service during the pandemic. This matter has not been resolved and I have been trying to upload our text conversations but unavailable.

resp.text: Our website states that we are allowed to make substitutions depending on availability of product as does all other websites.  The basket online was more expensive than what you ordered therefore yes there will be a difference in what you saw versus what was received.

name: Dianne
text: The arrangement of roses with the cupcake candles were gorgeous! My mother loved them! Thank you so much!! You really did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you so much.  It was our pleasure.

name: Tina Anderson
text: Great people to make arrangements with. I recommend them to anyone!

name: Stephanie Smith
text: I am so very disappointed in my experience with Valentine's Day flowers from here. Ordered a small bouquet to be delivered to my daughter at her work. Well it cost me $60.00. At 3:00 on Valentine's Day, she had still not gotten her flowers. I kept calling to check but phone was off the hook. I then left my job to go check on the order. When I got there they were very rude about the fact that I was there looking for the arrangement,  which was by the way on the floor at the front door with some of the flowers broken from being walked past, I assume as much. The lady did say they were trying to deliver as fast as possible, but you DONT deliver broken flowers. I took them with me and gave them to my daughter. Needless to say that will be the last time I use this florist.

resp.text: On any major holiday a specific time of delivery cannot be guaranteed.  orders are filled according to the order they are received.

name: Tina Riddlesprigger
text: I placed an online order for sympathy flowers. The flowers were never delivered. Four days after placing the order, and still no flowers, I had to send an email to have my money refunded. Very Bad Business

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  All orders placed on line are sent through FlowerShop network and all refunds they have to handle as well.

I would highly recommend JAMM to anyone needing a DJ for their wedding ceremony/reception or any event!  Geoff - thanks again for all that you did!

name: Florida Consumer
text:
When my daughter got married, I pretty much just paid the bills, let her manage the process and stayed in the background. However, I did not do that with regards to finding a wedding disc jockey in the Birmingham, Alabama area.

Why?

A lot of couples put a lot of energy into all of the other vendors that support a wedding, sometimes leaving the selection of the DJ until very late in the process when both time and money are short. That's a huge mistake because the disc jockey establishes the mood and tone of the wedding and the reception. Pick the wrong wedding DJ at the last minute and you'll be sorry.

When I contacted Jamm Entertainment Services about my daughter's wedding they patiently answered all of my questions, recommended the right services, and delivered exactly what they promised - a smooth, perfectly orchestrated wedding service and reception with a consistently packed dance floor that we'll remember for the rest of our lives!

I want to thank them in particular for their patience in answering all of our technical questions about the video and photo files we provided because they were a critical part of my daughter's wedding event.

If you're looking for the best Birmingham, Alabama disc jockeys, you'll be delighted with Jamm Entertainment Services just as I was.

name: Chelsea Madren (OC Food Diva)
text:
Bruschetta made with a balsamic reduction, tomatoes, basil, and garlic atop crostini. Fresh, juicy tomatoes burst with sweetness along with pungent garlic. The sweetness and acidity of the balsamic add another layer of flavor and fresh basil turns it up with herbaceous flair. Rating: 4.5/5

Brie and Marmalade Bites starts with a phyllo cup filled with orange marmalade, brie, and herbs. It is a light bite and would be great as a passed hors d’oeuvre for a wedding or corporate event. The creamy brie combined with the sweetness and citrus flavor of the marmalade pair perfectly together. Rating: 5/5

Caesar Salad is made with fresh romaine lettuce tossed with house-made Caesar dressing with anchovy. I love Caesar salad but it is very hard to find a place that makes it correctly. If you do not like anchovies, do not order a Caesar salad. It is just not a Caesar salad without it. Chef David makes a great Caesar salad dressing, not too thin and not too thick. The perfect viscosity to cling to the lettuce. I love that Chef David makes a crostini seasoned with butter, salt, and pepper instead of chunky, clunky croutons. It’s easier to eat and elevates the salad as well. Chef David, you need to bottle and sell that dressing! Rating: 5/5

Chicken Marsala is made with mushrooms, shallots, garlic, and parsley served over angel hair pasta. The chicken gently bathes in the sauce and really infuses the flavors into the chicken. It is tender and unlike any chicken marsala I’ve ever had. But that sauce is like liquid gold. It clings to the angel hair pasta like silk sheets. You can’t help but lick the plate afterwards. I could see this on a fine dining establishment’s menu. It is so refined and delicious! Rating: 5/5

Chocolate Fondant (Americans refer to this as a chocolate lava cake or molten chocolate cake) is basically a bi-product of a flourless chocolate cake and a soufflé. Chef David served his with macerated strawberries and strawberry coulis. If you go to my Instagram, I have a video of the chocolate “lava” flowing from the cake. I have tried many of these in my lifetime, but I think this was the best. I don’t know if it was because I had right out of the oven but it was just amazing! The perfect ending to a perfect meal! Rating: 5/5

name: TingTing S
text:
This company cancelled the catering for our event on the day prior to the event, without so much as a courtesy phone call.

We tried to use this service to book a private dining experience. We booked the date and spoke about the menu on the phone on 10-18 and received an invoice for the cost on 10-19. The due date on the invoice was 10-21, the date of the event. I tried to pay it on 10-20, but the invoice was already deleted and our event cancelled.

As per their policy, events must be paid in full 10 days prior to the event unless agreed upon in writing. Being that I received an electronic invoice with a due date of 10-21, I had believed this to be the "in writing" agreement that the policy referenced.

I had no reason to doubt the date listed on the invoice and the owner didn't mention anything else about invoice due dates during our previous phone call. Upon inquiry, they stated that the reason for cancelling our event was because we hadn't paid the invoice, despite it not being yet due. On top of this, they didn't have the courtesy of giving me a phone call to tell me that they cancelled, despite the invoice not being yet due!

This is incredibly inconvenient as it leaves me no time to find an alternative caterer.

Do not rely on this team for your events unless you are willing to tolerate a last minute cancellation due to their poor management and communication.

resp.text: We at OBC provided our guidelines and policies to the client multiple times, contacted the client via email and also via text to try and resolve.  We have also made a recommendation for an additional group to complete and provide services requested.  This is a very unfortunate situation.  We have not heard back from the inquiry and can only hope that she has received the services she has requested from our recommendation.

name: Babbette Rask

text: My family has used Fergusons for decades and I know why. I ordered a blanket for my mother's funeral and it contained what I requested but I left the rest to them and it was stunning! When I placed my order, I was assured they would take care of me (as I was nervous because I was ordering for my family) and they did not disappoint, nor have they ever. text: Wes did a fabulous job on flowers for my daughter’s wedding.  Good price, EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Seneka Stokes
text: I order a floral arrangement for my Mother for Mother’s Day and it started dying after two days. Not only that, the floral arrangement I asked for was nowhere near as full as the one I saw on the website. When I went to pick the arrangement up and asked about its fullness, I was told that the flowers would bloom once they get warm. Some of the small roses that were in the arrangement were broken when I picked it up. There was green floral tape around the top rim of the vase which could have been easily concealed with a nice ribbon. It was so much green foam in the bottom of the small sized vase. That may be why the flowers aren’t lasting as they don’t have enough room and are poorly cut and crammed in. We put the few flowers that we could salvage in a larger vase. It’s unfortunate that I paid $66 dollars for an arrangement that my mother will only get to enjoy for a few days. I have Walmart flower bouquets that are outlasting these. I usually buy special occasion flowers from Publix at a cheaper price and better quality work, but I wanted to patronize Ferguson’s florist because they are a locally owned business. However I will not use their service again because it seems as though the work was rushed and thrown together and just not worth the money.

name: Tashara Janae
text:
I have been ordering flowers for my mother every two weeks since the unfortunate passing of her husband. The flowers have not been up to par. We went to the florist today to return the flowers. When they arrived they were cut too short, looked nothing like the picture and were drooping and dying after two days. We arrived with a photo of the online order and were told that there was a shortage of flowers and they “substituted.” However, the substitution was poor quality. The owner, Noah Ferguson, came
To speak with us. He was rude, condescending and spoke disrespectfully to me and my mother. I will NEVER order from Ferguson again. I will be reporting this business to the BBB.

text: I want to say Thank You for doing a wonderful job on a floral arrangement that was done for my Mom and Dad's anniversary to put on Mom's gravesite.I had went to several florists trying to find the perfect arrangement and was very disappointed and didn't think I would find what I was looking for until I walked into Ferguson's.Everyone at Ferguson's was very polite and so willing to do their best at helping me to make sure I got the perfect arrangement to please my Dad.When my Dad went to pick it up the next day he was extremely happy with the arrangement.Ferguson's Florist has gotten two customer's that will only use Ferguson's for any arrangements we need from now on.If anyone wants to be pleased with beautiful arrangements and very polite,caring people then Ferguson's is the place to go.

name: Sebrina Crosby
text: I have never left a review for anything, good or bad, but the treatment I received from Ferguson Florist was so abhorrent, I felt compelled to not only leave a review but file a formal complaint with the BBB. I placed an order via their website to be delivered to a location clearly listed as one of the areas they service. A few hours later, I receive a call that they cannot deliver to that area. After being handed off to the manager, before I could even speak, the manager was SCREAMING at me that I'd have to pay 2.5 times the delivery fee that the website listed (which was determined after putting in the exact location). She said she didn't care if I got the flowers or not because I wasn't the one making them, they were.  She continued to scream and berate me. I have never, ever been treated so poorly by anyone, let alone anyone in any sort of customer service sector. The thing is, I would've paid the increase in the delivery fee, but it was the screaming and berating me, without even letting me explain what their own website said, that was so awful and upsetting.
