text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Amanda Samford
text: Olivia and Benjamin are the most kind, genuine people I’ve ever met!! It was such an honor to have them shoot our engagement session and our wedding. From the very beginning Olivia was so responsive and accommodating with scheduling. She was upfront and honest about what would work best for our timing and budget. She made us feel so comfortable at our engagement session and by the time the wedding rolled around she truly felt more like a friend than just a photographer. She had taken maternity leave just 2 months before our wedding date, but never missed a single beat. I’ll count her as a friend for the rest of my life!! If you are looking for incredible photos and an even amazing person, she is absolutely your girl.

name: Emma Bivings
text: Olivia was so helpful with all of my questions! She was quick to respond and totally willing to work with me to find the right fit. Would definitely recommend working with her!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Emma! Congratulations again!

name: Rosemary Chassen
text: My husband and I **highly** recommend Olivia Joy Photography! Having a stepdaughter that doesn't like to dress up makes taking traditional family photos difficult. Olivia had a fantastic idea to do photos in our home doing some of our favorite family activities. The photos turned out AWESOME because it truly captured the essence of our family.

resp.text: Rosemary, thank you so much! I loved every moment with your family and hope to continue taking your family portraits throughout the years. I sincerely had such a great time with you and yours! Have a great Thanksgiving!

name: Shelby Smith
text:
There are truly no words to properly thank Olivia and Benjamin for being the most wonderful additions to our wedding day, and also during the weeks leading up to our day during Covid. Olivia and Ben blew it out of the park, and I have such a critical eye for photography! They were absolutely PHENOMENAL. From their attention to detail and their willingness to go out of the way to get every single picture you could possibly want - I firmly believe there is not a better wedding photographer in Alabama. I have looked at hundreds of photographers all varying in prices, and none of them had the quality of images, consistency in editing, and photography style that she has. She was so organized, on top of every detail, and there for every moment I needed her. She also led me to several of my other vendors, who were all fantastic as well. I honestly just feel so overwhelmed with happiness looking at my wedding album! She also delivered my wedding album four weeks early. This woman is a saint- and so is Benjamin, her wonderful husband. Do yourself a big favor and hire these two. I will use them for every event in our lives go forward. Family pictures, future weddings and events, birthdays, you name it. I just wish I would have found them sooner!
Thank you for leaving me with the most beautiful images to document all of our memories. You will forever be family to us!

name: Janelle Falbe
text: Olivia is a great photographer and was incredibly flexible with our schedule and timeline. She was able to work with our 4 crazy kids and turned our family session into beautiful pictures that we will always treasure. Thank you so, much, Olivia!

name: Monica Hill
text: I can not say enough great things about Olivia. She was one of the sweetest ever! I truly loved seeing her work with my daughter and all her friends while taking the phones. You see my daughter and her girls are all very experienced in taking photographs and Olivia worked so well with them to get the perfect shots. I loved that she caught me in moments of quite tears while reminiscing with my daughter on her day of getting married. I loved that she went the extra mile for Jessica and Trey on their day.  From catching all the little ones dancing at the reception to the moment of first looks. I cried a lot that day but it was all happy tears and mostly at the moments that were caught in time by Olivia! Thank you Olivia Joy and assistant photographer;) You were the BEST!

resp.text: Mrs. Hill, thank you so much for your kind words and letting us know what your experience with us was like on your daughter’s wedding day! Everything was so perfect and we were so, so happy to be there for you all!

name: marybeth kaylor
text: Olivia is so sweet, professional, and talented! She was incredibly patient with my baby and made us all feel at ease. Highly recommend her and can’t wait to use her again for family photos!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Marybeth! I hope to always be there for y'all to take your family photos. Jack was such a cutie!

name: Sarah Sexton
text: We adore Olivia! She handled my request for fun and playful laidback photos with ease and gave us the most beautiful images! We will cherish them always and can’t wait for another session with this sweet photographer soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sarah! Can't wait to capture more of your memories.

name: Kayleigh Cochran
text: Oliva did an AMAZING job photographing my wedding! Her and her husband made the best team, and made our day so incredibly special. Oliva was so easy to work with and truly wants to capture exactly what  you imagined! I highly reccommend her to any bride. She made my small (covid-friendly) wedding a dream. I'm so excited to have these photos! We love and adore her!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kayleigh! It was such a privilege to be there for you and Graces! We wish you two the best.

name: Hannah Winters
text: Having Olivia come to our home to photograph my family was an amazing experience from beginning to end. She has an authentic way of capturing moments without feeling too posed or forced. She went above and beyond to make sure she had enough images in several rooms of the house, front yard and back yard. You can tell she is passionate about what she does and wants to make sure she delivers the best images possible that look beautiful but also tell the story of your family.

name: Courtney H
text: We loved every minute of our session with Olivia. She was so laid back and that made our family pictures so much more enjoyable. She was very professional and I felt like I could ask her as many questions as I needed without her feeling annoyed. I would give her 10/10 stars if I were able! She captured my little family beautifully.

name: Sarah Capra
text: Olivia is such a joy (pun intended 😍) to work with! She is patient and accommodating with my three dogs and 12-month-old baby! She has taken photos for our family three times now and I’m already looking forward to working with her again once our new baby arrives in June! Olivia’s work is beautiful, she is kind and professional, and she has a quick turn around for photos! I highly recommend Olivia to capture all of the special moments in your life!

name: Courtney Shevchenko
text: Olivia did an absolutely amazing job on our 6-month anniversary pictures! We were both nervous about having our pictures taken, and she made us feel very comfortable and relaxed. I actually cried when looking through the gallery because they turned out so well. I would highly recommend Olivia for anyone looking for a photographer!

name: Savannah Rawlston
text: Olivia is so fun to work with! My Fiancé and I were so nervous, but she directed us so well and the pictures are better than we could’ve hoped. Will be using her for every future event!!

resp.text: Thank you, Savannah! I loved every moment of your engagement session on Morris Ave!! You and Clay were so wonderful to work with!

name: Brittany Raborn
text: Grateful for Olivia’s patience and hard work during our session. Our family of 5 felt so comfortable and at ease while Olivia snapped some photos of us being in our own element. We loved our photos and would recommend her to anyone!

name: Lauren Colburn
text: we LOVE Olivia! having never had professional photos taken of us, my fiancée and i were a little nervous starting out and were afraid we would look awkward. but olivia was amazing at directing us and making us feel comfortable! can’t wait for her to shoot our wedding day!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Lauren! I loved every moment with you and Chandler and we cannot WAIT for your wedding next month!

name: Jessica Williams
text: Olivia was a JOY to work with! She was patient and kind with me and my husband during my maternity photos. She also was considerate of all of my needs. Highly recommend!

name: Marla Thompson
text: Olivia was absolutely wonderful to work with! She had a very calming demeanor and was very professional! The photos for my newborn session turned out beautiful and I will cherish them for the rest of my life! Thank you Olivia!

name: Jessica Turner
text: Tina and her team were amazing to work with and worth EVERY PENNY! After our consultation, my mom and I were very impressed with Tina’s experience, professionalism and thoroughness! It was incredibly easy to make our decision to hire her. Throughout the months of planning, Tina was always a phone call/ text away and always responded promptly. She made the stress of the Bride (myself) and mother of the bride essentially nonexistent (there’s always a little stress we will feel while planning). Her ideas were consistent with trends, which I appreciated very much. She also had a way of making my dreams for my wedding and my mom’s vision come together to be what we both wanted. On the day of our wedding Tina and her team made the day go seamlessly. She made me feel as if I was the only one who mattered and like I was her own daughter whom she wanted everything to go perfect for. Her idea of the candy/ popcorn bar was a complete hit! My guests are still talking about how they loved it!! Tina and Hannah also did a phenomenal job keeping up with our other vendors and making sure everyone was punctual and improvised when the cake arrived damaged (which I had no idea until the end.. thank goodness). I cannot be thankful enough that our paths crossed and she became our coordinator. The relationship she builds with her customers is something that is true and genuine. You will not regret hiring InStyle Weddings & Events for your big day or special event. Thank you Tina, Hannah, Greg and the rest of the crew for all you did for us.

name: Reds Vibe
text: TIna is the BEST! She calmed every nerve and took care of EVERYTHING. She coordinated every vendor and worked with the venue! Tina made sure everything was covered. It was such a huge help and relief! She suggested amazing vendors and worked well with all of them! The wedding went off without a hitch and Tina was the one who made it happen!! She also has great rentals that helped personalize my wedding, they set everything up and took it all down! SO sweet, professional, and helpful!!

resp.text:
Elaine, it was our absolute pleasure to help you create this beautiful memory that you, family and friends will have for a lifetime.

May God Bless You In Your New Life Together.
InStyle Weddings and Events, Planning and Design Services

name: Karen Terry
text: If you want the most beautiful and stress free wedding, you need Miss Tina. She is so kind, thorough, and professional. She is an amazing wedding planner and a wonderful person.

resp.text: Karen and Scott, this makes me so very happy,  that you are happy. What we always strive to remember is this, this one day in your lives you will always remember for a lifetime,. and I want this to truly be “your Best Day ever”.  Congratulations!

name: Mark W. Douglas
text: Tina Murray is fabulous in her work ethic and attention to detail. She will help your day Shine like you Dreamed it would! Highly Recommend!

name: chattfiremike
text: Tina Murray and her team at In Style Weddings are amazing!!! They were so responsive and accommodating, always providing feedback for any question, big or small, and always went out of their way to make sure everything for my wedding was taken care of. Lecia, my day of coordinator, made sure that all of the décor for the reception was taken care of two days in advance and set everything out-it looked absolutely gorgeous. Everything she did relieved me and my mom of so much day-of stress. Hannah, my bride's assistant, was at my side during all of the pictures before the ceremony, holding my flowers when I needed help with my dress, adjusting my train, pinning my hair back and making sure my veil was in place at all times. She was truly a lifesaver and made it so easy for me to enjoy taking pictures and had everything you could possibly need from bobbie pins, to a mirror, to a glass of water. Tina is extremely honest and straight forward, which I LOVE. I always felt that she had my best interest in mind and would give me the best advice so I could make decisions regarding all aspects of the wedding. I am not from Chattanooga, so I had questions about almost every vendor and she never steered me wrong. She was so much fun to get to know and from the beginning, I felt at ease with her, knowing she was going to be on top of everything for the reception. Since I had a church ceremony, she did not coordinate for that, but she made sure to know all of the details and really took my vision and made it a reality for the entire event. If you are looking for a coordinator, and don't want to spend a fortune, In Style Weddings is the way to go. They do not sacrifice professionalism or quality of service, they are extremely helpful, can fit into almost any bride's budget, and are absolutely worth every penny for the peace of mind they provide! I am so thankful to have had Tina and her team help make my wedding day perfect for my husband and me!

name: Paige Pertuit
text: I cannot say enough nice things about Tina and Lecia. We originally were not going to hire a planner because we thought we had everything under control, but I'm SO glad we did. It saved my mom and I so much stress the day of. Lecia went above and beyond. My wedding would not have been near as great without her. She is so sweet, professional, and really knows her stuff! Thank you for everything!

name: UnbiasedReport
text: I just let myself in. No, my whole family and I just let ourselves in. The room was unlocked. No one was around. No one was on site to be reached about reserving the space. Perhaps it was just bad timing.

name: Marie Hughey
text: Everything about our experience was amazing. We had our wedding here on April 10th and it was everything I ever wanted. Cody, Elizabeth, and the whole Oak Island Team were amazing! It is a great venue for anyone looking to get married on the lake. It is truly a venue only so you're able to choose all your own vendors rather than having to use the provided vendors as it is with some venues. We had our rehearsal dinner at the mansion Friday night and the entire wedding party was able to stay both Friday and Saturday which made thing so easy! I would absolutely, 100% recommend this venue for any wedding or event!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the incredible review and kind words, Marie!  It was our pleasure to be a part of your special day and we are so happy that you chose Oak Island! :)

name: Fatima Santos
text: My husband and I got married at Oak Island and it’s one of the best decisions we’ve made. Cody was amazing! He was very accommodating to our needs and requests. He was easy to reach and talk to whenever we had questions. We rented the island for 3 nights to give us time to enjoy the island as well as set up decorations that we wanted for our wedding. The house itself is very beautiful inside and out. It such a unique venue, which made our wedding even more special.  Everyone that is part of the Oak Island team was wonderful! They all worked well with us and  helped us in any way they can. Thank you for making our day extra special with your hospitality. I definitely recommend this venue to any brides looking for a unique and beautiful venue.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the incredible review and kind words, Fatima! Your wedding day was absolutely gorgeous! It was our pleasure to be a part of your special day and we are so happy that you chose Oak Island!!! Best wishes and many years of happiness to you and Kyle!

name: James Allen
text: Went to a weddings for a coworker there. Beautiful grounds and building. Interior decorated top shelf. Lakeside views and totally relaxing.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and kind words, James! Happy to have you at Oak Island!

name: Shelby Henninger
text: Cody is hands down the best person I have spoken to since looking for the perfect venue. He was responsive, informative, caring, and did not lead me astray or try to sell me anything. On top of providing the best customer service, he ended our conversation by providing references for other venues to consider. Do not miss out on contacting Oak Island!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review and kind words, Shelby!  :)

name: Michelle Hendrix
text: My husband and I worked with Cody the whole time. He was nothing but helpful and considerate of everything. I was so scared I would not be able to afford a place like this. Because it’s beautiful and has so much to offer. But he told me they book to how and what you need! I couldn’t be more happier with our choice and the people we worked with! We worked with a lady named Elizabeth as well! Everyone there was so nice! I would highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Michelle!  We can't wait to see the photos from your wedding weekend!  Thank you for choosing Oak Island Mansion for your special day!  We wish you all the best!

name: Chad Blankenship
text: The best I have seen in a long time🏆🎯🏁🇺🇸🎰💲❗➕   =(🔛🕧)

resp.text: Hey Chad, thank you for the review and kind words!

name: LK W
text: Pictures make this place way more beautiful than it actually is.  Very nice and helpful owner.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments.  We appreciate your interest in Oak Island.

name: Rachel Kebbel
text: I did not end up booking Oak Island Mansion as my wedding venue, but they were the first venue I contacted for information/scheduling a tour. I spoke with Cody on the phone and he was extremely nice, helpful, and informative. Many wedding venues try to nickel and dime potential clients, but it was made clear to me that Oak Island always has their client's best interest in mind and that there are no hidden stipulations or fees. Though this wasn't my perfect venue just based on my wedding vision, I would recommend it to any bride looking for a flexible, classy, Southern event that will be sure to delight their guests!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the incredible review and kind words, Rachel!  It was our pleasure helping you and we're so happy that you were able to find that perfect location for your wedding vision.  If there's anything we can assist you with in the future please don't hesitate to reach out anytime.  Congratulations to you both!  We wish you all the best!  :)

name: Music Is Life
text: Oak Island is an incredible events venue for weddings, corporate events, private parties and more.  They have multiple places on their property for beautifully stunning wedding settings from a classy Antebellum style wedding, lakeside wedding, to an awesome rustic barn wedding.  Did I mention it's literally on an island?!  :D  There is no better place in Alabama to have your dream wedding.  If you're a bride searching for that perfect wedding venue in Alabama, do yourself a favor and don't waste any more time.  Oak Island is the wedding venue to book.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and feedback!

name: Melanie Tinney-Woods
text: Nice everything

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Melanie!

name: Bailey Cochran
text: I had my wedding here and it is a very gorgeous venue everything was very nice. Elizabeth is the main owner I dealt with and while she was nice on the initial tour she would not respond to any texts or calls after we paid our deposit and we had to end up getting on touch with some of the other owners who were very nice. She was very rude on the wedding day. After the wedding, the caterer was boxing up food and Elizabeth (the owner) asked for a plate and after our caterer told her she would have to ask my mom because we paid for all the food she proceeded to just help herself to our leftover food. If you’re a bride and want a helpful venue owner who is responsive and not have to worry about everything being good then this is not the place for you. It’s a shame though because the venue itself is gorgeous.

name: Nekita Clark
text: Beautiful! Nestled hideaway. Beautiful venue for an intimate wedding. Helps when the wedding party was wonderful as well.

name: Whitney Washington
text: Breathtaking

resp.text: Thank you so much, Whitney!

name: Debra Lovelady
text: Located on Lay Lake in Wilsonville, AL, Oak Island Events is the perfect venue for weddings or other events.  From the antebellum mansion, to the chandelier barn,  Oak Island Events offers many beautiful backdrops.  Message Steve or Sharon Lee on FB to schedule a tour.  You may also visit their website.

name: Shawn Sweeney
text: A truly beautiful venue for weddings, proms, or family reunions! Enjoyed every minute there.

name: Crystal Baker-Conner
text: Absolutely Beautiful!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Crystal!

name: Becky Gibson
text: Be careful this venue will take your money and provide nothing!!! Had to find another venue for wedding and reception in a short period of time with no prior warning.  Very very disappointed and had already printed and sent save the date cards!!!  Never been treated so badly by anyone before in my life.  Stealing money from people is a crime!!!! DO NOT USE!!!! They still owe me money.

name: Megan Hoehn
text:
ABSOLUTELY PERFECT WEDDING DAY!!
When looking for a venue in a town we were unfamiliar with, finding Yolanda and her staff was a god-send. We wanted to avoid the "wedding nightmares" you hear about with vendors falling through or ripping you off or all of the above and we chose wisely. We visited the venue and after meeting Yolanda, we immediately said “this is the one”. We looked no further and this is the only venue we visited. It is as beautiful in person as you see in the many photos on their website and in other bride's pictures. I cannot wait to get our pictures/videos back. It is a family owned business and quite reasonable in the grand scheme of average wedding costs. We had unlimited contact and visits with all staff. We moved to the south a year before getting engaged and decided to have everyone come down to us for a good ol’ southern wedding. The logistics were overwhelming and Yolanda, Candace and Terri were wonderful in making sure everyone was picked up, transported and generally accommodated. They take care of all the major details so for a detail-oriented person like me, it was great because I had time to craft my own little personal touches. We rented out the mansion for the immediate families and wedding party to spend the night with their guests and when we pulled up, we got nothing less than Ooos and Ahhs about how beautiful and serene it all is. Every vendor Yolanda has in her arsenal is remarkable and a joy to work with - she wouldn't have it any other way and that is how you know you're looking at the right venue/planner. The day-of coordinator (Terri) is a MUST-DO for Brides. We actually ate at our wedding! We had our first meal as husband and wife and no one even knew and just assumed the wedding norm ( that you don’t get to eat the delicious food you hand-selected!) It was absolutely incredible. Everyone was so surprised that she answered all of their questions, let them do whatever they wanted within reason and even partied and had a blast with us. You will not find a more flexible venue/planner anywhere. There were bridesmaid's guests that were not a part of the wedding party and while we were off taking pictures or getting ready, she let them hang out, swim in the pool and generally do whatever as if they were at their own homes. In terms of the wedding, she was willing to go above and beyond to make the day special for us. She found us the perfect officiant who let us do a cultural element as part of our ceremony – something they were equally as excited to see executed. We wanted to light off lanterns at the end of the night and she said absolutely. Nothing was out of the realm of possibilities or "against the rules" and that is how your wedding day should be - exactly as you want. Everywhere else we looked there was a “No-no” list of things you cannot do – be out by 11, no open flames, no loud music, etc etc. That list does not exist at Oak Island and they will try to accommodate all of your requests within reason.

If you are looking for a one of a kind wedding experience with seasoned professionals, listen to their advice (they've done way more weddings than you!) and go with Oak Island Weddings. We could not have been happier with our choice.
